name: Pullman Guangzhou Baiyun Airport

reviews.text: Stayed here for 1 night of 11 March in room #1618 while transiting from Guangzhou to Hunan province. I had booked an executive twin as its tariff including breakfast was working out to the same as standard deluxe room with extra payment for breakfast.
reviews.title: Serves the purpose

reviews.text: Room decor was to our expectation though I had a higher expectation for the room size. In bathroom, a couple of lapses - bathroom lock did not work and though a rainshower-head was fitted, the diverter did not work so had to settle with hand-shower.
reviews.title: Unwelcoming Pullman Baiyun

reviews.text: Otherwise, stay was fairly satisfactory. Breakfast spread was fairly good with fair amount of local choice alongside the standard international spread of breads, eggs-to-order, bakery products and cereals.
reviews.title: Excellent airport hotel

reviews.text: I would surely recommend readers to use this hotel if they need to stay for short transit requiring quick-access to Guangzhou Airport.
reviews.title: Great Airport Hotel

reviews.text: This hotel gives you exactly what you expect and better, something that seems to becoming rare in hotels especially in airports. The bellmen are friendly and helpful and speak English well and the room service I ordered was also delivered on-time and was good. I only stayed to get a good night's sleep before an early flight, but I thought the bed was very comfortable and the room was cozy. There was also a view of the airport. Overall, while it's expensive I felt that this hotel delivers good value.
reviews.title: Truly 5*

reviews.text: This hotel is in a prime location especially if you need airport access just brisk walk away. As my wife and I arrived we were greeted by the staff and young man came over to greet and assist with my reservation all within 2 mins of arrival. He promptly upgraded us to a suite on the 6th floor as the room we booked was not available. Let me say the suite was very luxurious, clean and modern and the bed was really nice and soft we slept so it was unfortunate that we could not stay longer as we had an early flight the next day. I would like to thank that young man who assisted us. If I fly through Guangzhou again I will not have to consider any other option but the Pullman hotel great service with a smile.
reviews.title: Superb! Service

reviews.text: Staying at this great property made our stay in Guangzhou. We found the service to be truly genuine...which is hard to find these days. We tried to tip a number of the staff and they all refused to accept our money...the staff was amazing.
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.text: The food at the Asian restaurant was outstanding. The executive level rooms were immaculate.
reviews.title: A great Airport hotel

reviews.text: Located at walking distance from the airport, the hotel is very convenient for travelers who arrive late. The Executive lounge on the 6th floor is very professional and the overall smiling faces of all the staff in the hotel are quite impressive. The spa does not seem very lively but looks huge and modern. Beds are just very comfortable and nothing is missing in the rooms, even if bathrooms are rather small, compared to the rest. The concierge team was very efficient to deal with luggage. One of the best airport hotels I stayed in.
reviews.title: An oasis of calm in a popular transit hub

reviews.text: Awesome hotel within an easy walk of the Guangzho Airport.
reviews.title: Where to stay near Guangzho airport
My first of many reviews, "No Sleep"

reviews.text: Despite being so close to the airport, it was surprisingly quiet.
reviews.title: Well situated, expensive, breakfast not included!

reviews.text: Was able to get a great night's sleep.
reviews.title: Where else to go ?

reviews.text: Next to the airport, so it was easy access by walking. They have large comfortable rooms - but get out and look around. The hotel has a lot of interesting decor, koi pond and outside there is a nice green area to walk through and relax. Great bed with pillows and bolster. The room service was not overpriced, the food was good and they gave an accurate time when it would be delivered. With advanced reservation, they will ask to arrange to meet you in the airport. I did not take this and was able to find the hotel just fine.
reviews.title: Relax and explore the grounds

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Pullman on our way back to Australia from the States. We had 12 hours between connecting flights. We had pre booked and even though we arrived at 6:00am we were warmly welcomed and give a room. After a great buffet breakfast in the restaurant we went back to our room to refresh up and sleep before our upcoming flight. This hotel is wonderful; an absolute haven when resting between flights. We would return without hesitation.
reviews.title: Excellent Stopover

reviews.text: I stayed here for one night between an domestic flight from Hangzou going back to London. (FYI It is worth investigating if you are flying with Southern China Air and have a stop over 8 hours on international flights if the airline will give you a free night at a hotel as they were offering this. ) They offered a free pick up and it was nice to have a staff member meet me off my flight and walk me to the hotel. It is only a few minutes walk but when you are arriving at 12.30am it was good to have someone take any stress away.
reviews.title: Good for a rest between fights. Watch out of for check out charging in different currencies

reviews.text: The room was very nice. The window into the bathroom would not be for everyone but there is a curtain you can put down for privacy. There was no noise from the airport however the walls to the other rooms were very thin. I could hear if someone sneezed next door. When i arrived my neighbour at 1am had his TV on and I don't know if it was very loud in his room but it was noisy in my room and the reception had to ask him to turn it off. I slept soundly and it was great to be able to have a shower before my next flight. The products were good with shampoo, conditioner and body cream provided. There were also handy toothbrushes and toothpaste etc.
reviews.title: Really good bargain and really nice rooms

reviews.text: There was a kettle, cups and tea and coffee in the room, also two small free bottles of water.
reviews.title: Is this a joke?

description: Pullman Guangzhou Baiyun Airport – an innovative airport hotel for upscale business travelers.Located in the central area of the Guangzhou Baiyun Airport and only a 30-second walk from the Departure Hall and a 30-minute metro ride to city centre, this modern hotel provides 460 exquisitely furnished rooms and suites，5 unique restaurants and bars offering sumptuous cuisine, the magnificent Concorde Ballroom and 10 flexible meeting rooms equipped with advanced hi-tech facilities. You can dispel the fatigue after a busy day in Fitness Center or Outdoor Swimming Pool or rejuvenate with a relaxing spa in Touch SPA. Every guest can relax and enjoy themselves in a calm and caring environment in Pullman Guangzhou Baiyun Airport.
